name: HighStreet Metaverse Platform
description: Led the architecture and systems design for HighStreet's metaverse initiative - a large-scale MMO platform supporting thousands of concurrent players across web, VR, and mobile platforms.
longDescription: As Game Systems Architect at HighStreet, I spearheaded the design and implementation of core systems for our metaverse platform. This involved architecting networking infrastructure capable of supporting 10,000+ concurrent players, designing matchmaking systems, implementing social features, and optimizing performance across multiple platforms.
responsibilities: Architected multiplayer systems for 10,000+ concurrent players
Led optimization efforts reducing latency by 40%
achievements: Shipped to production supporting 10,000+ concurrent players
Mentored engineering team on advanced systems

name: Rhythm Attack VR
description: An innovative VR rhythm game combining music, action, and strategy. Players defeat rhythm monsters by slicing projectiles to the beat. ITI graduation project with custom art, music, and visual effects - 100% original content created by the team.
longDescription: Rhythm Attack is an award-winning VR rhythm game developed as an ITI graduation project. The game features unique rhythm-based combat mechanics where players must slice projectiles to the beat while managing monster health bars. The game features escalating difficulty that adapts to player performance, immersive VR controls, and a complete original soundtrack.

name: Estimation Kings
description: A professionally published multiplayer card game based on Middle Eastern trick-taking games. Features real-time matchmaking, progression system, and social features. Available on Google Play with 10,000+ active players and 4.5‚òÖ rating.
longDescription: Estimation Kings is a polished multiplayer card game that brings traditional Middle Eastern games to mobile platforms. Built with Phaser.js and featuring robust server architecture, the game includes real-time multiplayer with global matchmaking, comprehensive progression systems, social features, and extensive customization.
status_details: Live on Google Play with 10,000+ monthly active players
achievements: Published on Google Play and App Store

name: ComfyUI Quality-of-Life Suite
description: A comprehensive suite of custom nodes for ComfyUI, featuring 176+ GitHub stars. Provides essential utilities and workflow improvements for stable diffusion and AI art generation workflows.
longDescription: ComfyUI-QualityOfLifeSuit is a collection of custom nodes designed to enhance the ComfyUI experience for AI artists and developers. With over 176 stars on GitHub, this project has become a valuable resource in the ComfyUI community, offering essential utilities and workflow optimizations.

name: Unreal Engine 5 Game Suite
description: A portfolio of advanced Unreal Engine 5 projects demonstrating expertise in modern game development, multiplayer systems, combat mechanics, and professional C++ practices.
longDescription: A comprehensive collection of Unreal Engine projects showcasing proficiency in modern game development practices, advanced networking, combat systems, and professional C++ architecture.

subProjects.description: Multiplayer shooter with advanced combat mechanics and networked gameplay

name: Unity Tools & Frameworks
description: A collection of professional-grade Unity tools and frameworks used by developers worldwide. Includes state machines, event systems, and performance optimization utilities.
longDescription: Professional-grade development tools designed to streamline game development workflows. These open-source frameworks are widely used in the community and demonstrate advanced C# architecture and design patterns.

subProjects.name: SO State Machine
subProjects.description: Scriptable Object-based state machine with visual debugging

subProjects.name: Optimized Unity Scroll List
subProjects.description: High-performance UI scrolling with object pooling

name: Zinad Security Training Games
description: Suite of serious games for cybersecurity awareness training deployed to Fortune 500 companies. Multi-platform solutions for web, VR, and Kinect-enabled training.
longDescription: As Team Lead at Zinad, I spearheaded development of a comprehensive serious games platform for enterprise cybersecurity training. These games translate complex security concepts into engaging, interactive experiences, deployed to major organizations worldwide.

subProjects.description: Interactive game teaching employees to identify phishing attempts

longDescription: Full-stack game development for web platforms, demonstrating expertise in custom JavaScript engines, Node.js server architecture, and modern web technologies.

name: 3ashara Tawla
description: Modern take on the classic Middle Eastern backgammon game featuring online multiplayer, advanced AI, and extensive customization.
longDescription: 3ashara Tawla brings the traditional Middle Eastern backgammon experience to digital platforms with modern graphics, robust online multiplayer, and sophisticated AI opponents.
features: Two unique game modes: Ma7bosa and Thirteen
